meanings.definition: In a clever or deceitful manner.
meanings.sent1: She cunningly devised a plan to outsmart her opponents.
meanings.sent2: The fox moved cunningly through the forest, avoiding traps set by hunters.
meanings.sent3: The magician cunningly made the coin disappear before our eyes.
meanings.sent4: The spy moved through the crowd cunningly, blending in seamlessly.
meanings.sent5: The puzzle was solved cunningly by the young detective, revealing the hidden clue.

meanings.definition: In a sly or crafty way.
meanings.sent1: The cat cunningly stalked its prey, ready to pounce at any moment.
meanings.sent2: The thief cunningly slipped through the back door without being noticed.
meanings.sent3: The raccoon cunningly stole the cookies from the jar when no one was looking.
meanings.sent4: The old pirate cunningly navigated the treacherous waters, avoiding enemy ships.
meanings.sent5: The villain cunningly plotted his next evil scheme, keeping it hidden from the heroes.
